item.description: <p>Nearly $30 billion was put on credit cards during the month as Aussies looked to get ahead buying their Christmas presents.</p>

item.title: Australian teen charged after allegedly making hoax mass shooting calls to the US
item.description: <p>The FBI tipped off Australian authorities, and the boy could now face over 20 years&#x27; imprisonment.</p>

item.title: Trump claims to be running Venezuela, but US citizens told to stay away
item.description: <p>Armed militia are searching cars for evidence of US citizenship. But the president said he&#x27;s in charge.</p>

item.title: How Iran's collapsing currency led to the deaths of hundreds and may topple an entire country
item.description: <p>In 1979, ﻿one US dollar was worth about 70 Iranian rials. Today it&#x27;s worth more than 1.4 million rials.</p>

item.title: Up to 1000 passengers evacuated and flights delayed after smoke at Brisbane Airport
item.description: <p>Up to 1000 passengers were forced to evacuate Brisbane Airport,﻿ and flights were delayed after the fire alarm was activated. </p>

item.title: Quoting religious texts could be exempted from new hate speech laws
item.description: <p>Prime Minister Anthony Albanese has urged reporters to read the Old Testament to better understand why quoting religious texts has been listed as an exemption under new laws to combat hate speech.</p>

item.title: Teen, 14, accused of stabbing Coles worker seeks mental health defence
item.description: <p>The boy, then aged 13, allegedly approached a female Coles employee at Yamanto Central Shopping Centre in Ipswich, southwest of Brisbane, a year ago.</p>

item.title: More than half of Australian drivers admit to hitting another car and not leaving a note, study claims
item.description: <p>&quot;Accountability appears to decline sharply among younger drivers.&quot;</p>

item.title: NSW Fair Trading warns shoppers after online store attempts to profit from Bondi terror attack
item.description: <p>The shop claimed its owner was shot. But he doesn&#x27;t actually exist.</p>

item.title: Recall notice issued for popular electric car after warning it could catch fire while charging
item.description: <p>D﻿rivers are being warned to not charge the battery to 70 per cent or higher.</p>

item.title: Hero police officer Amy Scott's cancer fundraiser surpasses $350k in one day
item.description: <p>The appeal for Inspector Amy Scott, which had an initial fundraising goal of $25,000, has garnered more than 6000 donations.</p>

item.title: Man pulled from car and charged over alleged murder plot in Sydney's south-west
item.description: <p>T﻿he 26-year-old was charged with conspiring and agreeing to murder, and participation in a criminal group contributing to criminal activity. </p>

item.title: 'Offensive weapon': Woman sentenced for crepe attack on former Northern Territory chief minister Natasha Fyles
item.description: <p>A woman who slammed a cream crepe into the face of a chief minister has been given a 12-month suspended jail sentence for aggravated assault.</p>

item.title: Thomas Sewell's neo-Nazi National Socialist Network to be 'fully disbanded' before hate speech laws
item.description: <p>High-profile neo-Nazi Thomas Sewell says his white nationalist organisation and other linked groups will disband before the government brings in tough new hate speech laws.</p>

item.title: Commotion in court as man accused of attacking imam denied bail
item.description: <p>A man accused of attacking an Islamic religious leader in a road rage incident has tried to jump out of the dock after being refused bail.</p>

item.title: Man charged over NSW police chase after support worker found dead at his Logan home
item.description: <p>Wa&#x27;el Alfar, 36, allegedly led police on a pursuit across multiple suburbs on the NSW mid-coast yesterday afternoon.</p>

item.title: 'I'm completely sorry': Man caught up in Bondi bomb scare apologises
item.description: <p>34-year-old ﻿Cleophas Machaya issued an apology to the Bondi community before travelling back to Melbourne.</p>

item.description: <p>Anthony Albanese said the former PM&#x27;s decision was &quot;entirely&quot; his own.</p>

item.description: <p>P﻿rime Minister Anthony Albanese said the day would come with the theme &quot;light will win&quot; as Australia mourns.</p>

item.title: Donald Trump takes aim at Greenland's defence system as 'two dog sleds'
item.description: <p>T﻿rump has mocked Greenland&#x27;s ability to defend itself, vowing &quot;one way or another, we are going to have it&quot;.</p>

item.title: Adelaide Writers' Week cancelled, remaining board members resign after author controversy

item.title: Residents rescued by helicopter after Queensland town's wettest day in 110 years
item.description: <p>The extent of the damage left in the wake of ex-cyclone Koji is becoming clearer as floodwaters recede in central Queensland.</p>

item.title: Police scour bushland in case of missing South Australian mum
